== Introduction ==

We are preparing Kubuntu Noble Numbat (24.04 LTS) for release in  <nowiki>[[https://discourse.ubuntu.com/t/noble-numbat-release-schedule/35649 | April, 2024]]</nowiki>. With this '''Beta''' pre-release, you can see what we are testing in preparation for our next version.

'''NOTE:''' 

This is Beta Release. 
Kubuntu '''Beta Releases''' are '''NOT''' recommended for:
* Regular users who are not aware of pre-release issues
* Anyone who needs a stable system
* Anyone uncomfortable running a possibly frequently broken system
* Anyone in a production environment with data or workflows that need to be reliable

Kubuntu Beta Releases are recommended for:
* Regular users who want to help us test by finding, reporting, and/or fixing bugs
* Kubuntu, KDE, and Qt developers

Please '''report your installation results''' on the <nowiki>[[http://iso.qa.ubuntu.com/qatracker|Release tracker]]</nowiki>.

General bug reporting guidelines can be found here: ReportingBugs and <nowiki>[[https://invent.kde.org/teams/distribution-kubuntu/docs/-/wikis/Bug-Triage-Story|KubuntuBugTriage]]</nowiki>.

== Getting Kubuntu 24.04 LTS Beta ==

=== Upgrading from 23.10 ===

To upgrade to a Kubuntu 24.04 LTS pre-release version, run '''sudo do-release-upgrade -d''' from a command line.

=== Download a Disk Image ===

Download a <nowiki>[[http://cdimage.ubuntu.com/kubuntu/releases/24.04/beta/|Bootable image]]</nowiki>. Direct downloads, torrents, and zysnc are available as options.

== New features and changes in 24.04 LTS Beta ==

Calamares Installer
New Kubuntu Branding! ( Didn't make  beta )
=== Core desktop and applications ===

==== Plasma 5.27: simple by default, powerful when needed ====

<nowiki>[[File:PlasmaNN.png||width=800]]</nowiki>

<nowiki>[[https://kde.org/announcements/plasma/5/5.27.0/|Plasma 5.27]]</nowiki> has been developed to make it smoother to use while retaining the familiar setup. Plasma 5.27 is intended to be an LTS, <nowiki>[[https://community.kde.org/Schedules/Plasma_5|to be supported for a few more bugfix releases]]</nowiki>. 24.04 Beta ships with the 11th bugfix release (5.27.11)

==== KDE Applications updates, including KDE Gear 23.08.5 and other updated apps ====

<nowiki>[[File:AppsNN.png||width=800]]</nowiki>

==== Web browser and office suite ====

* <nowiki>[[https://www.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/117.0/releasenotes//|Firefox 117]]</nowiki> snap is the default browser from the <nowiki>[[https://snapcraft.io/firefox|Snap Store]]</nowiki>.
* <nowiki>[[https://wiki.documentfoundation.org/ReleaseNotes/24.2|LibreOffice 24.2]]</nowiki> is provided by default in the full installation.

==== Qt and KDE Frameworks ====

Kubuntu 24.04 LTS Beta ships with Qt 5.15.12 and KDE Frameworks Version: 5.115.

==== Pipewire ====

Pipewire has been the default audio backend since 22.10, replacing pulseaudio.

== Other highlights/notes ==

=== Plasma Wayland session ===

* A Plasma Wayland session is available for testing, but is not currently supported. A Wayland session can be started by installing the plasma-workspace-wayland package, log out, select it at the login screen.
